data.title: Maverick® Corn Herbicide
data.meta_description:
Maverick® Corn Herbicide uses three effective modes of action to deliver a broad spectrum control of problematic weeds, including waterhemp, Palmer amaranth and annual grasses, as well as application flexibility from preplant (PPI) up to 18-inch corn, low use rates for easy in-field handling and mixing, and excellent compatibility with atrazine.

Combining three different modes of action (clopyralid, a Group 4 - Plant-Growth Inhibitors, mesotrione, a Group 27- HPPD Inhibitors, and pyroxasulfone, a Group 15 - Very-Long-Chain Fatty Acid (VLCFA) Inhibitors), makes Maverick an excellent choice for herbicide resistance management programs.
data.text:
Weed Control

Corn Your Way

Maverick® Corn Herbicide uses three effective modes of action to deliver a broad spectrum control of problematic weeds, as well as application flexibility from preplant (PPI) up to 18-inch corn, low use rates for easy in-field handling and mixing, and excellent compatibility with atrazine.

Sustainable Solutions Criteria – [PRODUCT-TITLE]

Valent U.S.A. has developed a classification system that defines and identifies sustainable practices and attributes applicable to our ag product portfolio across three pillars of sustainability – People, Planet, and Productivity. This system, called Sustainable Solutions Criteria, uses specific icons that highlight these key sustainable practices and attributes for our products. Products that achieve a high sustainable criterion ranking across all three sustainable pillars are also denoted by the Sustainable Solutions Icon. Click on the icons below to learn how [PRODUCT-TITLE] can support sustainable practices in your operations.
